name: clubplus-mvp
description: Club+ MVP - Plataforma de combos de streaming compartidos

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/prisma && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd packages/prisma && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd packages/prisma && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:deps
scripts.clean:backend: cd apps/backend && rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:frontend: cd apps/frontend && rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:prisma
